mapper.select: select id, name, type, icon, parent_id, resource_path, request_method, router_name, router_path, component_path, create_time, update_time from permission where id = #{id}
select id, name, type, icon, parent_id, resource_path, request_method, router_name, router_path, component_path, create_time, update_time from permission

select p.id, p.name, p.type, p.icon, p.parent_id, p.resource_path, p.request_method, p.router_name, p.router_path, p.component_path, p.create_time, p.update_time from permission p, role_permission rp where p.id = rp.permission_id and rp.role_id = #{roleId}

select distinct p.id, p.name, p.type, p.icon, p.parent_id, p.resource_path, p.request_method, p.router_name, p.router_path, p.component_path, p.create_time, p.update_time from permission p join role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id join user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id join user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.username = #{username}

select p.id, p.request_method, p.resource_path, concat('ROLE_', r.name) as role_name from permission p join role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id join role r on rp.role_id = r.id where type = #{type}
